[[inst_hl_swi_po]]
==== HL.SWI.PO

*Syntax:* hl.swi.po SrcD, [SrcR, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swi_po.svg[HL.SWI.PO encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* STA/POST_INDEX

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "POST_INDEX", "agu_kind": "STA", "note": "User confirmed all stores are AGU/STA + STD", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["AGU", "STD"], "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
